Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1111 THIRD AVENUE,SUITE 2100, SEATTLE, Washington, 98101, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Remitly Global Inc provides integrated financial services to immigrants, including helping customers send money internationally in a quick, reliable, and more cost-effective manner by leveraging digital channels. It supports cross-border transmissions across the globe. Its revenue is generated on transaction fees charged to customers and foreign exchange spreads between the foreign exchange rate offered to customers and the foreign exchange rate on the company's currency purchases.
